name: Alex Malvehy
quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works. Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

name: Jane Doe
quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun. Creativity is intelligence having fun. Creativity is intelligence having fun.

name: John Smith
quote: Good design is good business. Good design is good business. Good design is good business.

name: Emily Johnson
quote: Design adds value faster than it adds costs. Design adds value faster than it adds costs. Design adds value faster than it adds costs.

name: Michael Brown
quote: Design is thinking made visual. Design is thinking made visual. Design is thinking made visual.
